mapper.insert: insert into gmair_mqtt_management.attribute(attribute_id, name, description, required, block_flag, create_time) values(#{attributeId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{required}, #{blockFlag}, #{createAt})
mapper.select: select a.attribute_id, a.name, a.description, a.required, a.block_flag, a.create_time from gmair_mqtt_management.action_attribute_relate r left join gmair_mqtt_management.attribute a on a.attribute_id = r.attribute_id where r.action_id = #{actionId}
